column1: Clinical Pharmacy Practice with Research Project MSc
column5: If you are an overseas pharmacist who is currently practising in your respective country and want to enhance your clinical and research expertise and gain hands-on experience of pharmacy practice research in the UK.This degree offers a unique blend of knowledge and training with hands-on research experience adapted for the most popular career pathways in the pharmacy profession. As part of the course you will carry out a pharmacy practice research project.
column7: International fees: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
